title: kaNTakulanu
sahitya:
kaNTakulanu nammanEranurA mukkaNTi sannuta shrI rAma
puNTi vaNTi dAsavenTa tIrcETaTuvaNTi daivamu nIviTa nuNDaganE
 

caraNam 1

AshalacEta dhanEshula gAcina gAsi cAlunu vrddhshalu jUpE

caraNam 2

rAja dasharatha rAja suputra rAjamA tyAgarAja sumitra

caraNam 3

Agatajana pOSaNAgama sancAra tyAgarAja hrdayAkara ninu vinA

caraNam 4

natajana pOSaNa mita paribhASaNa shrta tyAgarAja sannuta sarvalOka

caraNam 5

parama pAvana nAma karuNA sindhO vara tyAgarAja hrcara dInabandhO
